name: 勞維俊
objective: 本課程重點包括MLA論文格式以及論文引用形式。本課程內容同時也協助學生準備碩士論文寫作，亦將使修課同學學習什麼是一個好的論文題目、如何開始探究議題、以及用清楚及正確的英文改進論文初稿。
schedule:
Course Objective:
This course aims to familiarize students with the MLA/APA style of research paper writing (MLA style for documentation is widely used in the humanities, especially in writing on language and literature). Students will learn how to select a topic, conduct research, compile a working bibliography, evaluate sources, take notes, outline their projects, and write drafts. Moreover, they will learn how to cite various forms of publications and prepare the list of works cited, how to cite sources in the text, and how to use abbreviations in research papers.

Course Outline:
1: Introduction 
2-3: Choosing a Topic
4-5: Identifying and Using Library Sources
6: Screening. No class 
7-8. Detailed study (Shakespeare’s Hamlet)
9: Mid-term essay due
10-12: Approaches to Texts
13-14: Composing and Revising 
15: Documenting Sources Using MLA style
17: Presentation 
18: Final essay due
scorePolicy:
Assessments:
Tutorial: 　　　　10%
Presentation:　　　　20%
Mid-term Essay 　　30% (Draft 10% + Mid-term essay 20%)
Final Essay: 　　　　40% (Draft 10% + Final 30%)
